bill_title: revise the authority of municipalities to regulate disorderly conduct.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the authority of municipalities to regulate disorderly conduct. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 9-29-3 be amended to read as follows: 9-29-3. Every municipality shall have power to provide for keeping and preserving the peace and quietness of the municipality, to prevent disorderly conduct in any place , to prohibit public intoxication, and to prevent and suppress riots, affrays, noises, disturbances, and disorderly assemblies in any place. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
